title: On the basis of this I / we hereby certify that to the best of my Knowledge and belief the said structure is structurally fit for the intended purpose
clause_text: On the basis of this I / we hereby certify that to the best of my Knowledge and belief the said structure is structurally fit for the intended purpose.
